attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Houses that are 'bought to let' are purchased at the expense of first time buyers.  This reduces the amount of houses available to first time buyers and contributes to house prices rising.  People wishing to get on the property ladder are forced to rent, virtually 'paying the mortgage for the land lord'.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
